price: Ɔsoro ne asaase so asraafoͻ (nyinaa) wͻ Nyankopͻn. Onyankopͻn ne Otumfoͻ a Ɔtumi ade nyinaa yε, Ɔne Onyansafoͻ.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walillahi junūdu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wakāna al-lahu ʿazīzan ḥakīman
